{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = B3 Front Transparent.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = Excito B3 "Bubba" Server |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://excitostore.com |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Excito_B3 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Excito |model = B3 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = RF1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6281; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v5 (Kirkwood) |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 800 MHz / 1.0 / 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = STMicro;M25P16VP; |flash1size = 2 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = DRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4T1G084QF-BCF7; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1116R; |eth3chip = Marvell;88E1116R; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:22:02
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2010.06;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.39.4-11;Debian 6.0.3;
|exp_if_types = SATA, eSATA, Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_sata_num = 2 |exp_esata_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 6-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, |jtag = yes,,
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery backup, eSATA, buzzer, metal case, |addchip = 4-port USB hub controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, General Purpose CMOS Timer;NXP;ICM7555;;1;,,, 3A, 24V Input, Integrated Synchronous Buck Regulator;Fairchild;FAN2103MP;;5;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = excito |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Debian, Arch Linux (Arm), Gentoo, RedSleeve
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 10/2010 |estprice = 400 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B004FV9T2A |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Sweden
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' 88F6281 ARM v5 @1.2GHz *Storage: 2MB SPI flash, SATA and eSATA *RAM: 512MB DRAM *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet *USB: 2x USB 2.0 *Power Source: DC Jack 12V
==Links of Interest== :[http://wiki.excito.com/w/index.php?title=Main_Page Wiki]
*[https://www.phoronix.com/scan.php?page=article&item=excito_b3&num=1 ''Excito B3 Mini ARM Powered Server'' on '''phoronix'''] *[https://www.expertreviews.co.uk/nas-drives/50399/excito-b3-wifi-review ''Excito B3 WiFi review'' on '''ExpertReviews''']
